ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I have great fun and I am one of the people discussing binding. Why is it always complaining when someone raises an issue for discussion? I
ygData.messageBody:
> lot of time in EQ should move on? I know people that
> only play one hour every other day and have a great
> amount of fun.

>Well if they're having a lot of fun, they must not be the people
>complaining about the binding issue then.

Actually, I have great fun and I am one of the people discussing binding.
Why is it always "complaining" when someone raises an issue for discussion?
I curse Verant for making a game that I think about during the day, hell
this game is quickly becoming my second most thought about subject during
the day. I dig the bard, so I like to thinkin about improvements.

What really pisses me off is Selo not working indoors. Why a druid/shaman
can zone out/SOW and pop in and enjoy the effects and we cant sing inside is
beyond me. They should make SOW de-duff when you zone to an indoor zone
under that guilse that you are no longer under than god's influence similar
to the minor illusion spell wearing off on zone.
